A Busy Girls Guide To Natural Curls

Posted on October 28, 2016 · < 1 minute read



 

Also can be purchased from the following ebook stores: Kindle, Barnes and Noble, and iBooks.

A Busy Girl's Guide to Natural Hair is a short and straight forward handbook on how to enjoy your natural hair without letting it take over your life. This book outlines wash day details, daily maintenance, and super simple hairstyles that don't take hairstylist skills. Before getting bogged down in natural hair information overload, this is the place to start
Tags: Nonfiction
